body:
Countyline Construction predominantly relied on word-of-mouth referrals as their main channel of generating new business. Because of this, I was contracted to build a new company website that would 1. Build brand equity and trust with prospects, and 2. Generate new business from Google search.
I started the project by conducting in-depth market research into County Lineâ€™s ideal customers in order to understand their pain points and deep desires. Then I condensed my research into three buyer personas that I would use to craft the brand identity assets. I created a story brand template and tone of voice chart to guide future copywriting, and I used Figma to build out a consistent design system.
From there I created the wireframes for each of the pages within scope and worked with County Line management to reach an agreement on component positioning and functionality. I finished the pre-development process by creating all the final designs in Figma. I developed the site using Next JS and built out a fully customizable drag-and-drop page builder experience using Tina CMS.
